statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_stem_cell_therapy;
SELECT trial_id, medical_condition FROM clinical_trial_stem_cell_therapy WHERE treatment_success = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, treatment FROM clinical_trial_stem_cell_therapy WHERE medical_condition = 'Diabetes';
SELECT COUNT(trial_id) AS total_trials FROM clinical_trial_stem_cell_therapy;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_stem_cell_therapy ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_stem_cell_therapy WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT trial_id, medical_condition FROM clinical_trial_stem_cell_therapy WHERE treatment_success = true ORDER BY medical_condition ASC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_stem_cell_therapy WHERE treatment = 'Surgery' AND treatment_success = false;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_trials FROM clinical_trial_stem_cell_therapy WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT MAX(trial_id) AS max_trial_id FROM clinical_trial_stem_cell_therapy;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_trials;
SELECT trial_id, condition, outcome FROM stem_cell_trials WHERE condition='Cancer';
SELECT patient_id, treatment FROM stem_cell_trials WHERE trial_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT condition_name, description FROM medical_conditions;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_trials ORDER BY trial_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_trials WHERE condition = 'Diabetes'
SELECT trial_id, patient_id, condition FROM stem_cell_trials ORDER BY trial_start_date DESC
SELECT trial_id, patient_id, condition, treatment FROM stem_cell_trials WHERE outcome IS NOT NULL
SELECT trial_id, patient_id, condition, trial_start_date, trial_end_date FROM stem_cell_trials WHERE treatment LIKE '%stem cell%'
SELECT condition_name, description FROM medical_conditions WHERE condition_name LIKE '%cancer%'
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_trials WHERE condition_treated = 'Hematologic Disorder';
SELECT patient_name, age, result_date FROM patient_data JOIN trial_results ON patient_data.patient_id = trial_results.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(result_date) AS latest_result_date FROM trial_results GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_trials ORDER BY trial_start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, therapy_type, condition_treated FROM stem_cell_trials WHERE trial_end_date IS NULL;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, medical_history FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT trial_id, outcome FROM trial_results WHERE result_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trial_id, patient_id, outcome FROM trial_results JOIN stem_cell_trials ON trial_results.trial_id = stem_cell_trials.trial_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Conditions WHERE condition_name LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Results JOIN Patients ON Results.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Trials.trial_name, Conditions.condition_name FROM Patients JOIN Results ON Patients.patient_id = Results.patient_id JOIN Trials ON Results.trial_id = Trials.trial_id JOIN Conditions ON Trials.condition_id = Conditions.condition_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Conditions.condition_name, Trials.trial_name FROM Patients JOIN Results ON Patients.patient_id = Results.patient_id JOIN Trials ON Results.trial_id = Trials.trial_id JOIN Conditions ON Trials.condition_id = Conditions.condition_id ORDER BY Conditions.condition_name, Trials.trial_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM trial_patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, condition FROM trial_patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, condition, enrollment_date FROM trial_patients ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, condition, age FROM trial_patients WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM treatment_details WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM trial_patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT patient_id, patient_name, condition FROM trial_patients JOIN medical_conditions ON trial_patients.condition = medical_conditions.condition_name WHERE medical_conditions.condition_name = 'Cancer' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, condition, enrollment_date FROM trial_patients WHERE condition = 'Diabetes' AND age > 40 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT researchers.researcher_name, researchers.specialty, COUNT(result_id) AS num_of_results FROM trial_results JOIN researchers ON trial_results.patient_id = researchers.researcher_id GROUP BY researchers.researcher_name ORDER BY num_of_results DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_date, dosage, remarks FROM treatment_details WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY treatment_date ASC LIMIT 10;
